headline: Here’s Why Roper Technologies (ROP) Shares Traded Down in Q2
summary: Conestoga Capital Advisors, an asset management company, released its second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The second quarter began with a historically poor start but gained momentum later as tariff fears subsided and market volatility dropped precipitously. Conestoga Mid Cap Composite returned 3.46% net-of-fees in the quarter, trailing the Russell Mid […]
